title: Weak legislatures in both China and Russia

content.question: Which of the following is true of both China and Russia?

choices.label: Both have weak legislative branches compared with the executive branch.
Both have developed strong, independent militaries.
Both place more emphasis on ideological correctness than on technical expertise within the public bureaucracy.
Both have moved from nationalism to multiculturalism as a central plank inÂ  state legitimacy.

content.answer: Both have weak legislative branches compared with the executive branch.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the implications of the similarities and differences between countries with different political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
